title: Set Up Automated MLS Search for a Buyer
description: An agent needs to set up an automated email search (a 'drip campaign') to send new listings to a buyer client.

tasks.description: Retrieve the buyer's search criteria from their CRM profile (e.g., location, price, beds, baths).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the client's specific search parameters.

tasks.description: Create a new automated search in the MLS using the client's criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: An auto-search is successfully configured in the MLS system.

tasks.description: Configure the search to send new listings to the client instantly via email.
tasks.expected_outcome: The notification settings are set to 'immediate email alerts' for the client.
